textAfterTable: 0 0 Enable cheat keys First enter CLUAConsole:EnableCheatKeys() in the console via Ctrl+Tab Ctrl+1: change paper doll armor type Ctrl+2: darken screen Ctrl+3: lighten screen Ctrl+4: show interactable objects Ctrl+6: change to previous paper doll Ctrl+7: change to next paper doll Ctrl+8: shows text boxes Ctrl+9: shows sprites Ctrl+A: animate sprite Ctrl+B: shows last FMV clip Ctrl+C: got to next chapter Ctrl+D: debug dump Ctrl+F: turns to character Ctrl+J: jump to space under cursor Ctrl+L: shows coordinates under cursor Ctrl+R: heals character under cursor Ctrl+S: select a sprite animation Ctrl+X: shows position info Ctrl+Y: kills character under cursor Effect Code animate sprite Ctrl+A change paper doll armor type Ctrl+1 change to next paper doll Ctrl+7 change to previous paper doll Ctrl+6 darken screen Ctrl+2 debug dump Ctrl+D First enter CLUAConsole:EnableCheatKeys() in the console via Ctrl+Tab Enable cheat keys got to next chapter Ctrl+C heals character under cursor Ctrl+R jump to space under cursor Ctrl+J kills character under cursor Ctrl+Y lighten screen Ctrl+3 select a sprite animation Ctrl+S
